Change a timer window title and/or command

1 Click the Timers button .

Or, on the Template menu, click Timers.

A list of timers associated with the template is displayed.

2 Select a timer to modify.

3 Click Edit.

4 In Window Title, edit the window title if necessary.

5 In Menu Command, edit the command if necessary.

6 Click OK.

7 When you are finished configuring timers, click Close.
